reviews.text: We used Driftwood Catering to cater our wedding and WOW! They were absolutely top notch, a breeze to work with, pure professionalism at all times through the planning to the event and even clean up and follow up. I don‚Äôt even know where to begin. Lauren P. was WONDERFUL! We planned via phone and email only since I was hundreds of miles away planning an event in PA. With 2 Pinterest photos she nailed how I wanted the tables to look, what meals would fit for my group, recommendations  on timeline, bread plates or baskets, coffee service, cake served or on the table‚Ä¶all these things I wouldn‚Äôt have ever thought of she broke down. With any change or idea, I‚Äôd have a new proposal in my inbox, never being kept in the dark of costs. Billing was extremely easy. Then the night of everything the staff was AMAZING! The food was delicious ‚Äì so many comments on it and not one on it being cold or anything. The night went off without any hiccups. Everyone was so kind and generous, the room looked gorgeous, food was amazing. I left my name plates that showed the type of food the guests were getting back hundreds of miles away at home and without skipping a beat Lauren figured out a plan B and executed it, no issues just went to work. Amazing experience and I will surely be using them and recommending them for any catering needs!

We used Driftwood for our wedding at Glidden House and could not be more pleased. The food was phenomenal. We served beef, salmon, roasted chicken, and vegan/gluten free cauliflower. Everyone raved about it! They made our gorgeous cake and it was amazing. Mary was our coordinator and we absolutely adore her! You can't go wrong with Driftwood. Just phenomenal! The chefs and staff were excellent and professional. They made our wedding a dream!

My husband and I used Driftwood Catering for our wedding on 10/14/22, and we were extremely satisfied with them. We were blown away when we did our food tasting and knew at that point that we made the right choice. Our guests raved about the food, especially the red wine braised beef that you didn‚Äôt even need a knife to cut. The service on our wedding day was excellent and quick, and they are attentive to any allergies that guests have. We worked with Candice during the planning process, and she was always willing to answer any questions. Luke was the catering manager for the night and was wonderful. Driftwood did not disappoint, and I would definitely recommend them for anyone planning a wedding. Thanks again!

Driftwood was the catering group for our wedding recently, and we have nothing but positive things to say! The food was incredible! We had beef, chicken piccata, or a whole roast baby cauliflower for our entree choices. Each came with a starch and a vegetable as well. The beef was SO tender. My wife had the cauliflower, which was enormous and delicious from what I heard, and we received numerous compliments about the chicken. Driftwood also provided our cake and cocktail appetizers, which were incredibly delicious as well. We worked with Candice and Mechelle during our process and both were very kind and helpful during the entire process. The tasting was awesome, and very professionally executed. We couldn‚Äôt be happier with the service: the bar and wait staff were off the charts. For our signature cocktail, we chose a strawberry Moscow mule, which I would say is an atypical cocktail, but the bar staff pulled it off wonderfully! I was so impressed. They brought us into the conversation on the day of the event when needed and treated us with the utmost respect. 5 stars all around. You‚Äôre not going to find a better wedding caterer, and the price is incredibly reasonable! We were pleasantly surprised when we saw the numbers! Driftwood is top notch. I‚Äôd recommend them to anyone.

Food is hands down THE most important part of a wedding. If you want to make sure your guests are leaving happy and full, book Driftwood. The appetizers were absolute showstoppers! People kept going back for more. During dinner, everything perfectly cooked, served hot, and extremely tasty. Meg was our event manager and working with her was a breeze! Our entire experience with her from the tasting to the big day was a blast. She went to every table while food was being served to ensure a smooth service, stayed the entire night assisting the waitstaff, AND even snuck in a dance with us. Thank you Meg and Driftwood for a memorable meal and evening!

recentReviews.text: Heidi is a great representative and the food was delicious!

We used Driftwood for our wedding at Glidden House and could not be more pleased. The food was phenomenal. We served beef, salmon, roasted chicken, and vegan/gluten free cauliflower. Everyone raved about it! They made our gorgeous cake and it was amazing. Mary was our coordinator and we absolutely adore her! You can't go wrong with Driftwood. Just phenomenal! The chefs and staff were excellent and professional. They made our wedding a dream!
Driftwood did an excellent job of catering a last minute event, and their staff were great communicators before, during and after the event. Would definitely work with them again!

The planner was cool and polite she gets a gold star. As far as the venue seemed a over rated and over all over priced. As much as you have to pay they are very short on options. Asking for a refund is like pulling teeth. If you do get a refund it will be greatly reduced, next to nothing. Terrible response I can‚Äôt even get the decency of a phone call or a text. Better venues for a fraction of the cost are out there with far greater options. I only have regrets with this company. Good luck

Driftwood was the catering group for our wedding recently, and we have nothing but positive things to say! The food was incredible! We had beef, chicken piccata, or a whole roast baby cauliflower for our entree choices. Each came with a starch and a vegetable as well. The beef was SO tender. My wife had the cauliflower, which was enormous and delicious from what I heard, and we received numerous compliments about the chicken. Driftwood also provided our cake and cocktail appetizers, which were incredibly delicious as well. We worked with Candice and Mechelle during our process and both were very kind and helpful during the entire process. The tasting was awesome, and very professionally executed. We couldn‚Äôt be happier with the service: the bar and wait staff were off the charts. For our signature cocktail, we chose a strawberry Moscow mule, which I would say is an atypical cocktail, but the bar staff pulled it off wonderfully! I was so impressed. They brought us into the conversation on the day of the event when needed and treated us with the utmost respect. 5 stars all around. You‚Äôre not going to find a better wedding caterer, and the price is incredibly reasonable! We were pleasantly surprised when we saw the numbers! Driftwood is top notch. I‚Äôd recommend them to anyone.

My husband and I used Driftwood Catering for our wedding on 10/14/22, and we were extremely satisfied with them. We were blown away when we did our food tasting and knew at that point that we made the right choice. Our guests raved about the food, especially the red wine braised beef that you didn‚Äôt even need a knife to cut. The service on our wedding day was excellent and quick, and they are attentive to any allergies that guests have. We worked with Candice during the planning process, and she was always willing to answer any questions. Luke was the catering manager for the night and was wonderful. Driftwood did not disappoint, and I would definitely recommend them for anyone planning a wedding. Thanks again!

We had a fantastic experience with Driftwood! Food is out of this world & the selection was unmatched. They provided everything we wanted & needed for our wedding day! Couldn't rate 5/5 stars due to contract manager complications- our person of contact changed multiple times. One of our managers left the company & didn't fulfill promises to fill us in with details prior to leaving. Weeks before our wedding, I was reaching out to staff looking for answers. There were also a discrepancy in the contact regarding the bartenders' tip jar. Overall, didn't change our opinion of the delicious food but some bumps in the road we experienced!

Food is hands down THE most important part of a wedding. If you want to make sure your guests are leaving happy and full, book Driftwood. The appetizers were absolute showstoppers! People kept going back for more. During dinner, everything perfectly cooked, served hot, and extremely tasty. Meg was our event manager and working with her was a breeze! Our entire experience with her from the tasting to the big day was a blast. She went to every table while food was being served to ensure a smooth service, stayed the entire night assisting the waitstaff, AND even snuck in a dance with us. Thank you Meg and Driftwood for a memorable meal and evening!

detailedReviews.text: We had a fantastic experience with Driftwood! Food is out of this world & the selection was unmatched. They provided everything we wanted & needed for our wedding day! Couldn't rate 5/5 stars due to contract manager complications- our person of contact changed multiple times. One of our managers left the company & didn't fulfill promises to fill us in with details prior to leaving. Weeks before our wedding, I was reaching out to staff looking for answers. There were also a discrepancy in the contact regarding the bartenders' tip jar. Overall, didn't change our opinion of the delicious food but some bumps in the road we experienced!

detailedReviews.author: Samantha Ventura
detailedReviews.text: Food is hands down THE most important part of a wedding. If you want to make sure your guests are leaving happy and full, book Driftwood. The appetizers were absolute showstoppers! People kept going back for more. During dinner, everything perfectly cooked, served hot, and extremely tasty. Meg was our event manager and working with her was a breeze! Our entire experience with her from the tasting to the big day was a blast. She went to every table while food was being served to ensure a smooth service, stayed the entire night assisting the waitstaff, AND even snuck in a dance with us. Thank you Meg and Driftwood for a memorable meal and evening!

detailedReviews.author: Allen Wiant
detailedReviews.text: Breathe easy!  Driftwood has you covered.  Two family weddings and a retirement party are cherished events catered by the best in CLE.  The team has partnered with us on several major fundraising events as well and never disappoint.

detailedReviews.author: J.P. AuWerter
detailedReviews.text: I cannot recommend this group more highly! The food is always amazing, their service is top-notch, and they make every occasion more special. Make sure to contact Driftwood for all your catering needs. You will be impressed!

detailedReviews.author: Dinah Hodgson
detailedReviews.text: I have used Driftwood Catering multiple times and they have far exceeded any experience I have had in the past with catering. The service, the food, the plethora of offerings to the customer, their creativity, and their ability to work within anyone‚Äôs budget is top notch. I would, without hesitation, recommend the company for any catering needs!

detailedReviews.author: Katie Gottlieb
detailedReviews.text: I had the most amazing 40th bday with Driftwood! It was one of the best nights of my life! Thank you for everything Driftwood Catering!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Anna Minc
detailedReviews.text: Driftwood catering did an amazing job with an office holiday party and a birthday party for me. They made both events very special! The food was delicious and catering staff were extremely kind and helpful.  Every detail of the evening was thought through by Driftwood.

detailedReviews.author: Laura Lee Hogsett
detailedReviews.text: Used to be my go to spot. Reduced menu still in place, less than friendly staff and last night, we sat at the bar for 10 minutes.  Previous customer's dirty glasses in front of us. Not only did no one say a thing or wait on us, they left the dirty dishes in front of us. It was as if they left them there to avoid waiting in us.  There any many other options in the area. I don't mind a short walk.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Cardis
detailedReviews.text: Short rib was dry and tough. Food was mediocre at best.

detailedReviews.author: BING Cardis
detailedReviews.text: Got several uncooked chicken. Short rib was really dry. Overall bad experience!

detailedReviews.author: Julie Warren
detailedReviews.text: They catered a gala for a non profit I'm on the board with.  They did an amazing job working with our budget and were very prompt with communications.  The food was amazing, I will definitely use them again.

detailedReviews.author: Da Driver
detailedReviews.text: They have hosted 4 events or more at BMW CLEVELAND. Always professional easy going staff. I love there menu everything they bring is alway amazing. Than you! keep it up, maybe will do my wedding food from here.

detailedReviews.author: Bri Zanella
detailedReviews.text: We did not end up hiring Driftwood catering due to cost, but I was highly impressed with their responsiveness and level of professionalism. Their menu offerings are extensive and definitely suited to couples who prefer more variety than typical wedding chicken. Everyone answered our questions quickly and were really nice! If our budget was bigger we probably would have booked with them.

detailedReviews.author: Cat Wilson
detailedReviews.text: We used Driftwood Catering to cater our wedding and WOW! customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customer opinions are divided. The 3.8/5 rating from 24 recent reviews suggests some great experiences mixed with areas needing attention.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently rave about the phenomenal food, including dishes like red wine braised beef and vegan/gluten-free cauliflower, which are described as tender and delicious. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The service provided by Driftwood Catering is frequently praised for being professional, attentive, and accommodating, with staff going above and beyond to ensure a smooth and memorable event. - review management can highlight this positive aspect

Driftwood Catering excels in communication and planning, with coordinators like Mary, Candice, and Lauren receiving high praise for their helpfulness and professionalism throughout the event planning process. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Poor communication and responsiveness from staff - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews and reputation issues regarding service and food quality - review management can address this concern
Competition and discovery issues due to better options available - SEO services can solve this visibility issue

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews

recommendations.title: Improve Customer Satisfaction
recommendations.description: Address common issues mentioned in reviews
recommendations.impact: Boost overall rating and customer retention
